name: Ophanim
resist: radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Divine Awareness
text: The ophanim knows if it hears a lie.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The ophanim has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The ophanim's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 21). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: bless, detect evil and good, invisibility (self only), scrying, thaumaturgy
3/day each: dispel evil and good, earthquake, holy aura

action.name: Multiattack
text: The ophanim makes four Light of Judgment attacks.

action.name: Light of Judgment
text: Ranged Spell Attack: +13 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 18 (4d8) radiant damage.

action.name: Holy Fire (Recharge 5-6)
text: The ophanim emits a burst of holy fire. Each creature within 30 feet of the ophanim must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 (18d6) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A humanoid reduced to 0 hp by this damage dies, leaving only a pile of fine ash.

spells: bless, detect evil and good, invisibility, scrying, thaumaturgy, dispel evil and good, earthquake, holy aura, commune, forbiddance,
